statements: SELECT * FROM SecurityEvents;
SELECT event_id, event_type FROM SecurityEvents WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM SecurityEvents WHERE event_source = 'server';
SELECT event_date, event_source FROM SecurityEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_description, event_type FROM SecurityEvents WHERE event_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM SecurityEvents WHERE event_type='Login' ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT event_id, event_type FROM SecurityEvents WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT event_source FROM SecurityEvents
SELECT event_description FROM SecurityEvents WHERE event_type='Security Alert' AND event_source='Firewall'
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_date FROM SecurityEvents WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY event_date ASC
SELECT * FROM SecurityBreaches WHERE breach_type = 'Data Theft';
SELECT date, location FROM FalseAlarms WHERE alarm_type = 'Fire';
SELECT id, location FROM SecurityBreaches WHERE date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT * FROM FalseAlarms WHERE location = 'Office Building';
SELECT location, alarm_type FROM FalseAlarms WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30';
SELECT id, location, date, breach_type FROM SecurityBreaches WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT date, breach_type FROM SecurityBreaches WHERE breach_type = 'Data Breach' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, location, date, alarm_type FROM FalseAlarms WHERE alarm_type = 'Fire Alarm' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, location, date, alarm_type FROM FalseAlarms WHERE location = 'Chicago' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityBreaches UNION SELECT * FROM FalseAlarms ORDER BY date DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityBreachEvents;
SELECT event_id, breach_type FROM SecurityBreachEvents WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT description, event_date FROM SecurityBreachEvents WHERE breach_type = 'Data Leak';
SELECT event_date, event_id, description FROM SecurityBreachEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT city, country FROM SecurityIncidentLocations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM SecurityBreachEvents;
SELECT event_id, event_date, breach_type FROM SecurityBreachEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT description FROM SecurityBreachEvents WHERE breach_type='Data Leak';
SELECT MAX(event_date) AS latest_event FROM SecurityBreachEvents;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM SecurityIncidentLocations WHERE country='USA';
SELECT * FROM SecurityBreachData WHERE location='New York';
SELECT id, date, breach_type FROM SecurityBreachData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, breach_type, description FROM SecurityBreachData WHERE breach_type='Hacking' AND location='California';
SELECT * FROM FalseAlarmData WHERE alarm_type='Fire' ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT id, incident_type, severity FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT * FROM SecurityBreachData WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, breach_type FROM SecurityBreachData WHERE description LIKE '%security%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT location, breach_type, date FROM SecurityBreachData WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND location <> 'Chicago' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM FalseAlarmData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND location IN ('Los Angeles', 'San Francisco') ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT id, incident_type, severity FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE severity > 5 AND incident_type = 'Data Breach' ORDER BY severity DESC, incident_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_breaches
SELECT id, date, location FROM false_alarms
SELECT pattern_name, severity_level FROM breach_patterns
SELECT location, date FROM security_breaches WHERE severity > 5
SELECT event_type, description FROM security_logs ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT * FROM security_breaches WHERE severity > 5 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, date FROM false_alarms WHERE reason = 'Technical Issue';
SELECT pattern_name, severity_level FROM breach_patterns WHERE severity_level >= 3 ORDER BY pattern_name ASC;
SELECT pattern_name, reason FROM alarm_patterns WHERE pattern_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM security_logs WHERE event_type LIKE '%breach%' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
